item.title: Memorable Moments
item.description: Notice The following content documents noteworthy records about my personal life. August 19th, 2023 After about 23 hours of total flight time, I arrived in Atlanta on Qatar Airways. item.title: Quick Facts about Shuojiang Liu
item.description: The following informal content can help you quickly understand Shuojiang Liu ðŸ‘‹ðŸ‘‹ðŸ‘‹ Before viewing… The information provided below is highly subjective and presented in an unprofessional manner, and the presentation itself is not yet rigorous. Life ðŸ§© Expand to view… He is a lifelong nonsmoker. He never consumes alcohol and disapproves of “drinking table culture.” He rarely drinks coffee. He seldom ever updates any changes to either his QQ Space or WeChat Moments.
